body:
I have prepared the local mkl configuration here:  https://github.com/gunan/tensorflow/tree/local_mkl
Once this PR is merged, I will create a new pull request.
@agramesh1 the model I have will be this:
-configure script won't ask anything to the users about MKL.
-using `--config=mkl` will be sufficient to build a pip package with MKL support.
-If you use the environment variable `TF_MKL_ROOT`, `--config=mkl` will use that mkl instead of downloading it from the internet.
Does the above sound good to you?
